p: DPPH assay is the most commonly method to determine the antioxidant activity of different components (Kumar et al., 2008 ▶). As shown in Table 1, DPPH test confirmed that methanol extracts of A. austro-iranicum, A . serotinum and A. chlorostegium exerted approximately the same free radical-scavenging activity with IC 50 values of 30-37 µg/ml.
